description: Cole Brooks is a punk that's been pirating DVDs. Except this dumb ass put the copy in the box he returned to the rental shop instead of the actual movie. The clerk catches on right away and the shop comes down on him, after all, everyone has read the FBI warnings at the front of every movie. Colby Jansen takes the lead and strips the young stud down. Cole is not afraid to fight back but the men aren't afraid to ram their cocks down his throat either. Tied up to the video rack Colby hangs weighted butterfly clamps all down his body. They make him crawl around to find cocks to suck as the weights hang from his flesh. Cole eats all the guys' asses to earn a load on his face before he gets a piledriver fuck in front of the store window as the foot traffic walks by. Colby cums on the window and makes Cole lick it up in plain view of the street.
title: Unauthorized Reproduction
